oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EX LIBRIS: A Monograph of Endangered Parrots
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dingle, Sheldon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Technically speaking, this is not a bookreview but is rather a book preview as thevolume is not yet off the presses. Theforthcoming book is titled A Monographof Endangered Parrots by Tony Silva,published by Silvio Mattacchione & Co.,Pickering, Ontario, Canada.Everything about Endangered Parrotsputs it in the "collectors" category. Thetext, the illustrations, and the actual physicalvolume itself, the thing you smell,touch and lovingly turn the pages of- allthese things combine, each with its ownexcellence, to form a volume virtuallyirresistable to true book lovers. And if youlove parrots also, you'll be ecstatic whenyou finally get Endangered Parrots inyour hands.
